/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -O3 -fPIC -lz -lpthread -g -O0   CMakeFiles/Mandlebrot.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Mandlebrot.dir/Bitmap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Mandlebrot.dir/Gradient.cpp.o  -o Mandlebrot /usr/lib/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so -lpthread /usr/lib/libboost_chrono.so /usr/lib/libboost_date_time.so /usr/lib/libboost_atomic.so -lmpfr -lgmp
